Let's get lost in the Asian BerMEDIA Triangle!

For this season's penultimate episode, we're doing another Asian media review, but in a slightly different style. Join us for 3 mini talks where each of us take on one side of the Asian media triangle (shows/dramas, music/k-pop, and books) to recommend and discuss. Linda also shares her study on LGBTQ+ Asian American identity and the role of Kpop.

Sally's recommended dramas/shows:

  • Crash Landing On You
  • Goblin
  • Hotel del Luna
  • Weightlifting Fairy Kim Bok-joo
  • Reply 1988
  • Giri/Haji
  • The Untamed

Linda's research article, Performance, Fantasy, or Narrative: LGBTQ+ Asian American Identity through Kpop Media and Fandom

Ming's recommended books:

  • If I had your Face by Frances Cha
  • The Poppy War (trilogy) by R.F. Kuang
  • Everything I Never Told You by Celeste Ng
